cab.content: 1 ',"Jh^yBATTLE SITUATION * NOON MAY 2lst*1. There is.no change in the general situations2*' Increasod artillery activity is reported astride the Somme and on to front ARRAS - ALBERT. There has been a good deal of movement in the back areas on this front particularly in the neighbourhood of WARLENOOURT and BAPAUME,General Staff, War Off 1*2, SVvVJ..Issued at 11.15 a*m*^ rtoi -3".
